text: Friendly people and an amazing atmosphere! And literally the best Falafel in Las Vegas hands down!

this place is bad the managers steal the waiters tips !!!!!!ask them to make your drink infront of you becuse they use cheap alcohole and overprice it i have seen them when i went to eat there last week just bad they will throw stuff on your check you have been warned dont go here..

So me and my BF were in Vegas for Vday and of course i wouldn't be myself unless I stopped at a hookah bar. I live in Houston and hookah literally consumes people's lives down here so I had to get my fix. I found a Groupon only $10 for 1 hookah flavor between 2 people. Can't beat that. I was in a rush and didn't notice I paid for the wrong Groupon (they had 2 options to purchase. One was for 1 hookah flavor and the other was for $20 worth of food) both were the same price so I asked can they still honor the Groupon. Al said he'll do it for us even though he's not supposed to so I was so grateful!! Only thing that kinda made me upset was I asked for some water only because I seen someone drinking a cup of water at the bar while doing HW and he decides to bring out 2 bottles of water. I didn't even make a big deal even though I much rather had water with ice chips that would've been free. At the end the water was $2/bottle. But whatever he honored the wrong Groupon so I'll return the favor by giving him 5 stars.
Good food and great atmosphere.  This place doesn't get very crowded so each visit is met with an attentive & proud staff.  The chicken shawarma plate is excellent!
best hookah lounge ever ! nice costumer service amazing experience! ask for Noam he's the best
Service was great staff was super friendly most of all great food, hookah and drinks.

Come for the delicious,  mouth-watering shawarma and delicately seasoned hummus, enjoy a masterfully prepared hookah, but stay, and return, for the love.   I adore hookah, but I'm very sensitive to loud music and distracted by the prevalence of sports television(a pox on them!) Guy, ever the gentleman, turned down the music for me and even turned off the TV, just so I could have a pleasant experience!  There aren't many hookah lounges in Vegas open in the afternoon, which all makes Layla Grill & Hookah a treasure!   Please, check them out!  You will not be dissapointed.
It was amazing night with friends and we met the host owner  Niza he was very friendly and I will come here soon to enjoy uca again

I'm actually sitting here right now and enjoying some hookah and shawarma pita.  
I must tell that this is the best shawarma i've ever had in my life.  The meat is so soft and so testy, the service is really nice, my server name is guy and he is so friendly.  
He gave me some free home made pickles and i loved it!
The hookah flavor lasts  for long time and it's so smooth and nice.  
I recommend this place and want to thank them for the nice hospitality.  :)

I seen they had a group on deal for half off, so i bought it!

I was in town for 3 days and went to 3 different hookah spots, and this is by far the best spot i've been to! The hookah was hitting great, the services was wonderful, they have two huge TVs to keep you entertained, it's very clean, the workers were very friendly. 

Not only was the hookah good, their food was amazing and reasonable price! I can't wait to come back to Vegas just to go here!

Great food. Great hookah. Awesome
Service. Owners do everything possible to make you feel like you are in your living room.

This place is hands down one of the best experiences I've had at a hookah lounge while traveling. Attractive staff, menu, and lounge! Pleasantly surprised by their selection of tobacco and quality of their food. I had the Shakshaka and double apple hookah. The food was a great portion and the hookah pipe hit like a champ. It isn't very often you find a place like this open mid morning with a quality product. I highly recondite this place to anyone. I'll be back!

I don't really appreciate it when I'm specifically asking for ice water and receive a bottle just to make me spend more money. 
The food is overpriced and neither myself nor my fiancé thought it was even good. 
The hookah was just ok. 
The waiter was friendly but that's not gonna make me come back or recommend this place.

Shahar runs a good business. The hookah he uses is of high quality, and you feel the hit after after a couple of puffs. He gets his stuff imported, so you know it's good.

We had the hummus layla; good stuff. The owner checks on us to make sure everything is sababa (great in hebrew). Will definitely come again, if only to see Shaha. Sam, one of the servers, took good care of us as well.
Amazing staff, best Mediterranean food in Vegas, and good hookah!
Layla is the best hang out place in Vegas!! You can do hookah and order food that is really good and for good prices.the service is amazing and the employes are really nice,also the music is amazing.
Love this spot. The owners are awesome, the food and service are great and the chill atmosphere is unbeatable.

Great customer service! Great hookahs! The food is excellent, can't say enough good things about the place.

Awesome Place... Guy and Sean manage  the place very well... The Hookah is awesome... Food Excellent... The behavior of both the people is excellent. 
All in all the place to be, if you want to have Hookah in Vegas.,.

My favorite place to go and enjoy some great food and great hookah. The best hamburger I have ever had! The house mix hookah is great! I always bring my friends and guests from out of town. Def a must go place!

Best hookah lounge in Las Vegas by far. The hookah was great, the drinks were good, great ambiance, and the service was great. All in all a great place. Highly recommend. Ask for Nitzan, he's the guy you want to know. Will definitely be a regular here

GREAT FOOD AND HOOKAH! We always come here. The owners are so great. They sit down with the customers and everyone is super friendly. You feel so welcomed. They remember you and make each customer feel special. Been a fan since before the expansion and now it's even more welcoming. They have a projector and comfy seats. This is definitely the place to be on the weekend or any other day of the week for that matter!
This is the best food I've had in a while. I never do reviews but couldn't resist the urge this time. Highly recommended!

great othentic food 
the best humus that i tasted in the US.
very very large dishes for a reasnable price.

Amazing place to hangout with friends or even just do some school work. They offer free Wi-Fi to customers which is nice. The servers are friendly and make great suggestions for hookah flavors and food.  Nizan is one of the mangers I've met after visiting 3 times and is very attentive to the guest.  

Overall I would definitely recommend Layla grill as a place to try out.
Good hookah, nice people, good food, definitely one of the better hookah places I've been too. I will be coming back to this place, and I think others should too!! :)
Great device, chill place. Pretty good hookah and a good selection of food. Highly recommend it.

The staff are nice and helpful the place is clean and pleasant. Prices are reasonable, wi-fi is free. Dishes are fresh and very tasty.
Highly recommended.
Very nice staff and I can say it's the best hookah in Vegas since I've tried most places. Didn't try the food there but I heard it's good.
LOVED IT ! been here once and I will deff keep coming back . The customer service was great as well as the food . Try their mint lemonade !
I was at your grand opening and it was really nice! Best hookah i've ever had! Also great eastern food, i love your kebabs, thanks for good service!

I ate a in lot of restaurants of this kind.  but only about this place, I can say that was the most delicious food ever. Especially the hummus, falafel, and the burger, I had not eaten such good food anywhere els in Las Vegas .Recommend very much. Thank you precious Chef made us delicious food.
Also, the atmosphere is very nice and the hookah is a very good desert.  
This place is my new spot. 
Thanks.
The experience is fun and exciting! Music is great! The service is also amazing! And most important, the food is great!

Before I talk about their hookah, I will like to say thank you for the best customer service we got from Gy. Thank you. The hookah we were recommended was a mix if Blue mist and  Rose, one of the best mix ever must try. This is best place to be when u stay in Las Vegas.

I can't say enough bad things about this place. We went here on a Saturday night around 11pm. Ordered a hookah and 2 beers. We took the recommendation for the waiter for the choice of hookah flavor (red gummy bear and white gummy bear ). Once it arrived we tried it a few times and it was disgusting. We notified the waiter who said that we just needed to allow the tobacco to warm
up. We asked him to start the hookah and it was still nasty. After that we asked for a different flavor which they brought. The rest of the night they proceeded to ignore us. They only time we received service is if we went to the bar or flagged down the waiter, even thought he was walking back and forth around the restaurant. At one point the hookah was no longer hitting as well so we asked for them to just change the coals. The waiter told us it's not the coals it's the tobacco. He refused to put more coal on the hookah unless we got a refill ( we had only been there for about an hour). Definitely won't be going back!! Worst service ever
Try the hummus mushroom and the pita falafel! Both amazing. The service and food here are incredible!
Amazing hookha lounge!!! The best hookha in las vegas!! Great atmosphere and the service is awesome!

Good food

Good people

my sister & i came here straight from the airport on our visit to Vegas! we had the best service with Guy he took care of us and went above and beyond to give us exceptional service!! we will be back later tonight and every time we are in town! 

it's clean, quick & amazingly friendly service! If I could give them 10 stars I would
They have the best shawarma and humus. The stuf is super nice. Good music. Nice place to be

This place is awesome. Friendly service. Great atmosphere. If you are lucky enough to live near here, you should be here. I would come here on the regular if i could, but I'm only visiting from Atlanta. Oh, did I mention the food is on point? 10/10 would hookah here anytime

Awesome place !! This is our first time here and the staff was polite and very quick to get you what you ask for , will definitely be referring Layla Grill & Hookah to my friends ! Great selection of hookah and the menu had more than enough options to please your appetite !
Best chicken shawarma in town!!  The ambiance is nice and the entrees are plentiful!  Next time I will get the beef and lamb entree which also comes recommended!  Baklava is delicious!
My favorite hookah place in Vegas, very nice friendly staff, very quick service, very clean, very fresh food , love it

Amazing place and good service.shon and Vector are going to take care of you very well. If you are in Vegas just go there. Music, atmosphere, food, drinks . Everything is good. They don't mix the flavor in the hookah.

What a gem. I had the shawarma and my mom had the marinade chicken breast. Both were outstanding. The chopped salad is a perfect accent, nice and light. The hookah was packed to perfection. The service was stellar and really felt more than welcome. I would recommend this place to anyone wanting amazing food and service. We will definitely be back. Wanting to come check out the atmosphere at night. Keep up the great work, Guy! Thank you.
Super friendly employees. The food is amazing!!! The only thing is that it is a small area and if it's busy you'll have trouble finding a seat-which I guess is a good problem to have for them!

This place is great and the service is excellent. I had the falafel and hummus and hubby had the schwarma plate..both are excellent. The ambience is quaint and the server was so friendly and warm. I would go back again in a heart beat and will tell all that visit Vegas to try this place out.

This place is one of a kind 
I come here 3-4 times a week and we always feel so welcome, they make us feel at home. 
The music is so nice and not to loud. 
Before we found out about this place we used to go to deferent hookah lounges in Vegas but all of them were dirty and the hookah wasn't so good..

They also serve some really good food and awesome appetizer menu.

Layla's is #1 in Vegas MUST COME & experience yourself!!

Laylas is definitely my favorite place ever! Not only is the food/hookah the best, but the customer service is amazing. Everyone who works here is so sweet and very well on top of things. The atmosphere here is both great during the day and  both at night. 10/10 would recommend

Visiting from LA, I came here with a friend.  The best hookah, suggested by the server. 
We ordered hummus& mushrooms, which was delicious 

They really took care of us, very friendly and promptly.

If you enjoy a nice Mediterranean food and hookah, this place is a must to go place.

One thing I would improve is the tea- fresh brewed or a better selection of tea instead of the Lipton tea.

The prices are very reasonable.
This is the place where you wanna boom boom and relax !!!  Nitzan is the best manager !!

My fiancé and I have been here twice now, and both visits earned five stars. The customer service is amazing, everyone is so friendly and personable. One of the owners recognized us from our first visit two months prior, talk about impressive! Their hummus and pita bread is delicious and fresh, and we were given another half order of bread on the house. Their chicken wrap is very large and tasty. I can't wait to sample more of the menu!

Now on to the hookah, they are very attentive to the coals, making sure the bowl doesn't burn. The selection of flavors is fairly decent, and even more impressive is that we were told they make it themselves! 

If you're looking for a cozy place with good hookah, yummy food, and great customer service, Layla's is the place to go.
Schwarma Tacos are so delicious! And our server is a legend man! Really cool dude. Our hookah was really smooth too. Really a hidden gem, would totally come here again and again!

Very nice food and ambiance. They have a variety of different dishes to meet everyone's  palate.  They are also able to meet your needs if your diet is restricted in anyway, service is quick but also very friendly. Definitely recommend.

The food is delish.  Our favorites are the sharwama and the mushroom hummus. Must try them.   Service is a little slow and good luck getting the check from the server.  The food is def worth coming here tho.
Best chicken shawarma in Town!!! Good Ambience..Owner is a very sweet person. Very good customer service. I come here once every week and no regrets.

Amazing service! My boyfriend and I came here for drinks and to smoke a bowl of hookah, and the staff was amazing. They answered any questions we had since we hadn't really smoked before, and recommended some really good beer that was so yummmmy. Definitely will be coming back :)

Awesome vibe 
Great food and staff 
Ive been coming to thus place since i moved to Vegas and it feels like home away from home
The food here is made fresh every day and every day you got something new on the menu
Food and atmosphere is great here. I like chicken thigh dark meat which usually not availanle other places

This place is amazing. The food is so incredibly good! We have nothing this good in California. Sometimes I wanna drive over to vegas just to come here!! The hookah could be a little better though, the actual tobacco isn't the best, but it'll do, the whole experience there makes up for the lack of some of the hookah flavors. The service is incredible!! Some of the friendliest people, I left very happy. Came here 2 or 3 times the last time I came to vegas. Its that good! Totally recommend this place!

Came here because I was craving Meditteranean and I was in the area and Layla Grill had good yelp reviews. I was starving having not eaten lunch and it was close to 7 pm. Was going to get a to-go order but was never greeted or provided a menu. Waited for ten minutes and no one from the back came out to greet me. I think they need to put a bell on the door! Sheesh

Ordered to go and it's horrible! I asked for pita and it says it comes with it but no pita. So lots of dips with nothing to dip. Also they completely forgot one of my salads. The food I did receive is under whelming and it seems they are more a bar then a serious food establishment

This place is delicious!! I have been looking for good Mediterranean food and this is it! Their hummus, corn salad and spicy edamame were my favorite! Their spring rolls are amazing as well. Must try!

Guy the owner has awesome customer service..... Place was nice for a hookah and restO food was great just kinda salty a little but my friend said the last time wasn't like that but still it was good the desert was really good too it's like fried crepe with sweetened milk was really good. Definitely would be back
Great food, excellent service. The best hookah in town. We love to relax at Layla every weekend.

Being a local to Las Vegas, I have to say LAYLA's is by far one of the best places to be. The staff is very friendly, they work very fast paced and always make me feel welcome. I've become more and more of a "regular" because with every visit the food gets better and better. 

The staff: Very friendly, very fast speed of service and always welcoming. Guy, Nadav, Orel, Josie, Jason and Nitzan know me by name and always take care of me when I am there. 

The food: IS SOOO DELICIOUS! I love their falafel, as close to authentic as I can get. I also recommend the hummus with mushrooms and onions. Even with Uber Eats the food is always hot and delicious. 

The Hookah: I have different flavors everytime. The guys will mix something up just for me to have a new flavor everytime. With such comfy chairs my friends and I can sit there all day. (did I mention... they have WIFI!)

This place gets 5 stars for me. It is totally worth dropping by, at any time of day because they are open LATE! *winning*

We've been coming here before they expanded the restaurant and have usually had a decent experience. On weekday nights they're decent service wise but for the last couple weekend nights the service has been terrible. 

Soon after ordering our first hookah and drinks, we were pretty much on our on. No one came to check on us and getting another drink required waving your arms like crazy just to get the attention of the bus person while he's walking by only to have him say he'll grab  one of the waiters who usually either forgets or comes 10-15 minutes later. 

Then after waiting another 30 minutes our hookah refill arrives and it's the wrong flavor (think getting straight mint when you wanted a fruity flavor). Then because no one came to check on our table, again, we had to walk to the bar to have it fixed.

Things go okay until the coal runs out on our hookah. We then asked 5 different times (2 times to one waiter, 2 times to the other, and 1 time to the bus person) who all said "alright it's coming right away! 2-3 minutes" only to have us wait 20 minutes each time and then having to go up to the bar to ask again (Yes we spent an hour and half asking for coals which were never delivered). Then out of frustration we decide that the waiting and poor service was just too much and had to go up to the bar to ask for the check. 

No one came back to the table to grab the check and again we had to walk the check up to the bar and hand it to someone. We also again asked to have some more coals while doing this. 30 minutes passes and we did not get our bill back (or the credit cards that were handed over) or the coals we had requested again. Finally after flagging down the same waiter again, he brought us our check to sign. 

I know that they were pretty busy last night, but what does someone expect for a Saturday night? Almost every table was filled and they had only two people taking orders with one bus person. All three just kept promising to bring what we asked but never apologized. I think it would really help this place out to have a couple extra servers on weekend nights. Every other table around us was equally having to flag people down or walk to the bar just to get someone's attention. 

It's sad because this place is decent on weeknights. One of the other owners works there and he's always very nice and attentive (a little bit longer hair, and always wears a button up shirt and jeans, Nitzan?). But the one that was working on Saturday night (short hair, usually wears a t shirt) rarely came to the table unless we spent time waiting for him to serve someone else and then flagging him down. Nitzan is an amazing server and always provides the best service, but the other guy while polite is not very attentive at all. 

In the end our bill was $90 for three people. The hookah wasn't bad while there was still coals on it and the drinks were okay. The service is really what killed our evening. We really couldn't even leave when we go frustrated with the service because it took another 45 minutes just to get our check and have them run it through the register. 

Disclaimer: We've been here many times, and the weekends usually repeat themselves. I feel like I know how to differentiate between bad service and a busy restaurant. This went beyond and above that. We basically got ignored even after going to and finding someone 5-6 different times. I'm usually pretty forgiving on any kind of server, but the servers here are the owners and they really need to just hire a couple people on the weekends. We still tipped 20%.

Hands down the best hookah lounge in las vegas, sure that is a very biased statement but you can't go wrong with Laylas! Honestly I've been here hundreds of times since they remolded I think a little over a year ago, and I'll keep coming back. The hookah is always on point, the food is pretty good for a hookah lounge, and the staff is always helpful and pretty consistent. No matter if I want a quick smoke and bite or want to meet with friends or coworkers alike for a smoke sesh, I'll always come here

You must visit this place when you're in town or even if you live here!!! Guy, who is one of the partners is such an amazing man and always wants his customers to get THE BEST service! He immediately sat us down and made such a BOMB hooka! We even got a complimentary homemade humus with a homemade spicy sauce and pickles, it's a must try! Hands down a great hooka place and the environment was extra friendly, just like your home! COME SEE THEM!

This place opened yesterday, 31st of January 2013. I went to the grand opening and it was a terrific experience. The space is a bit narrow but they utilized the space very well. It wasn't hard for us to find either. The owner, Shawn, introduced himself as he greeted us when entering. He was as funny as a comedian and  very professional. The staff was courteous and diligent. 

At the time of the hookahs were $10 and the second session was free. Even if they didn't have the promotion going on, the hookahs were reasonably  priced at $15.00 then $12.00 for your second round. The prices for the food menu are decent.

We ordered the hookah flavor pirates' cave. The hookahs hit good and lasted us around a hour on our first bowl. We ordered the kabob plate and it came with two sides. My boyfriend and I shared. Even though we shared the kabob plate, it filled us up.

I would highly recommend this place to anyone who likes to smoke hookah, also to those who want to try delicious mediterranean style food.
I only tried the mix platter entree, and it was quite bland and overall I've had much better. I didn't finish the entree and decided to cut my losses. Service was pleasant but not prompt.

Customer service is wayyyyy better than paymons! Go here for great hookah prices and services. They were on top our coals making sure we didn't run out. Food was tasty and good price. The hummus is so good! There's no stupid dress code like paymons where you can't wear sneakers or a hat. Or "sleeveless shirts" (Yes they made us buy a shirt from them. Lol they said males can't wear sleeveless tees but woman can.) You can actually come here and chill. Perfect little hide out and the music was jumping. We will be back. Very reasonable drink prices. #TeamLayla

This place sucks employees are rude, the boss is rude, and you can tell your black they treat you like trash  we sat for 30 and watch the serve the whole bar even the new people walking in before attempting to take our order then had a attitude and wanted to hold me card I guess to make sure we didn't walk out on are bill but didn't take nobody else's card I canceled my order and went somewhere else that my last time going to this dump and to make it worse they brought my card back with something on it he threw the card and walked off never felt so disrespected in my life

Good food with friendly staff. Atmosphere is okay.
Not my go to place but I would go back again.

Delicious food.  I had the shawerma plate with onion rings and red cabbage salad as well as a coke.  The red cabagge salad tastes a lot like cole slaw.  Its creamy and crunchy.

Sean was my server.  He is extremely friendly and personable.  He knew the nenu very well and was quick serving drinks and food.

I came around 3pm and it was easy to get a table.  You set at black leather couches with low faux granite tables.  The walls are red with a red brick design.  Layla is the type of place to bring a few pals, share a meal and lounge at.

Come check it out.  You'll be glad you did. :-)

Amazing hospitality. Came here on a Sunday night after a long night at work and it just made my day! Noam and Nitzamh are  the best!!! Such good food and drinks, I live literally a block away and I'm surprised I haven't been to this hidden gem yet! I will definitely  be back

Love this place, best food ever and the best hookah in vegas, fast service and very good humis in vegas
Perfect food

Started going here a couple years back and now my friends and I come almost 3 times a week :) Love the food, hookah and the workers!! We tried the pineapple bowl the other night and it was pretty good, lasted a good 2 hours and didn't get harsh at all.

Got this delivered through uber eats.. that being said I did not like it. Chicken was chewy and an odd texture.. I got the chicken shawarma. The grilled chicken lemon garlic sandwich was ok but still was chewy. 

Only pro: good pita

I have been here multiple times and every time I go, the service is just awesome. It is consistent - the staff is uber friendly and they make sure that you are having the best time possible each and every time. 

The hookahs are good and they consistently replace the coals with hotter ones and are asking you if its ok - if its too harsh or if its still good. There was this one time my friend had undercooked chicken and they apologized repeatedly and brought out free shots for everyone at the table. This is another cool thing about this place - they randomly bring out free shots for everyone if you are there long enough. The drinks are also very cheap so if youre looking for a place to pregame before a night out on the town. Shots are cheaper than beers haha The mixed drinks such as a crown and coke or jameson and ginger ale are always really strong. 

This place has really good food as well. They have falafel balls that are really scrumptious. 

All in all, whether you want to pregame before you paint the night red or just want to chill, this would be a good choice.

The waiters are REALLY nice and friendly. Never once have I NOT gotten a smile.

You must check out this hookah bar! The hookah, drink, and food is phenomenal! The owner and staff are amazing and attentive. I highly recommend this place. I'll definitely be back! Kudos to the owner, Nizzan.

Editing my review from 5/5 to 2/5. Was my second experience at Layla's and everything was great including the food and vibe. The service was a little slow when it got busy so that's to be expected and not a big deal. 

The reason for my edit on this review is because I woke up this morning throwing up the food I ordered(Shawarma plate). Could be an isolated incident but after the whole Firefly thing you never know.

My favorite hookah lounges by far! Excellent service! Hookah is great! Food is amazing! Love how they're open from 11am till late night! I've been a loyal customer for 4 years now! I'm now writing this because of how consistent they are. Not to mention the management/employees are super friendly. They will remember you by name! Love it! Seriously makes you feel at home. Definitely will recommend to anyone who loves hookah, good vibes, and FOOD! 5STARSSS
Great Food and Service Nitzan was very nice and helpful to My husband and I He made us feel like family  Hookah was very good I recommend this place to everyone All the staff goes above and beyond
It's hard to find a place that has good hookah and food. This place has both. Their customer service and hospitality is a model that all business owners should follow.

Great food !! the right flavors , big portions , and always fresh .
cant wait to be in Vegas in few months and visit Layla again 
great costumer service very friendly stuff
I've been to many Mediterranean place, this place is deceiving, the food are horrible, from the meats to hummus to the drinks (non alcoholic) is not, ALL TASETE SYNTHETIC.

Normally when I think of getting food from a hookah place, I think of overpriced options of mediocre quality: that is so NOT the case here. I don't smoke but was intrigued by their online menu. 

For just under $30, you can get a gigantic shwarma wrap and an order of schnitzel.
The wrap is huge. It's like a Mediterranean take on a burrito, packed with meat, some red cabbage and salad, and a bit of hummus for good measure. You also have an option for mayo, but I don't know why on earth you'd do that. It's fan-frickin'-tastic.
The schnitzel was my BF's pick: two thin-pounded, crispy cutlets, with two sides, for a filling portion of fresh food at $14. Not bad at all!

Side options include fries, onion rings, rice, red cabbage salad, white cabbage salad, Mediterranean chopped salad, egg salad,or cole slaw. Red and white cabbage salad are both pretty similar to coleslaw and the chopped salad is fresh and tasty.

Staff were super friendly and my order was ready very quickly. It's a bit of a drive for me, but I'm working it into my regular rotation for weekend lunches!

This honestly is one of my favorite hookah spots. I've been coming for over a year and a half and they hands down have some of the best hookah I've ever gotten. It's extremely sad to me to watch as they've expanded (I was so excited for this) their customer service has declined significantly. Tonight we waited 45 minutes to have coals put on our hookah.. We sat here with hookahs in front of us with no coals for 45 minutes. That's ridiculous and inexcusable

New favorite hookah lounge! The lounge itself has an open feel and is super comfortable. The music is on point along with the hospitable staff, not to mention the prices can't be beat compared to the other hookah lounges in town.
This Hookah Lounge is the best!!! we wanna take it with us to San Diego. Guy is amazing!!!

The only place I had a shawarma was in Kuwait so I don't have much to compare it to. I will say, the shawarma I had here was a lot different but not in a bad way. It was actually really good, just different.

The order came with 2 sides and I chose rice for both. Sides were small. I ended up with more meat than rice.

awsome food, the best hummus and falafel in Town. the staff is super friendly. i would defenetly recommend this place for all of my friends, don't waste your time and money go other fake Mediterranean restaurants. This guys are legit. also they have best hookahs in town. i will always come back.

Visiting Vegas, we searched hooka lounge and found this Gem. Fantastic food! Fantastic service! Fantastic house mix fruit and mint shisha! Couldn't ask for a better place to hang and relax after a tiring day. A definite must to visit.

Best hookah any day any time! I get off of work and head down here 2 - 3 - 10x's a week!! Literally come here at least 2x a week!

10++ stars YOU MUST TRY IT OUT YOURSELF!

Layla is my favorite place to get kosher food and grab a hookah. From my first time here guy treated me like family. That's what keeps me coming back. 

The food is amazing, the hookah is great and the staff is amazing :) 

This is my favorite place in Las Vegas.

Great place, nice food. Went there when it wasn't too packed and got very quick service with whatever my party needed. Shawn made us feel very welcome and gave speedy service. I would definitely recommend this place

Everything is worth a try! 
Hummus falafel
Chicken platter with rice
Hookahs are great too!
This is a great lunch spot! The managers are super friendly and welcoming, and the authentic Mediterranean food was delicious! Try the hummus shawarma, you won't regret it!
Nothing but good things to say about this place. The hookah, food, & drinks are great. Not to mention amazing customer service.. Ask for Nitzan, he will take great care of you. :)

So I finally checked this place out. It is a cool atmosphere with good music. The top 40 hits and hip hop. They have a lot of flavors for hookah so we decided on Sex on the beach. The flavor was cool but I have had better. They really didn't have many  upgrades like fresh fruit like other places. The hookah smoked well for about 2 hours. 
The food was the best part! We had the hummus with sharwma which was fantastic. I especially like the pita bread it came with. Then we ordered the mixed meat plate with corn salad and fries. Everything was the bomb and had a lot of flavor. Kudos to the chef!!! Also they have takeout if you just want to pick up. 
I rated it a 3 mostly because of the service which was really slow. At first it was cool but it got a little busy and it was like they forgot about our table. At the end it took 30 minutes to pay the bill. We waited at the table but finally went to the bar and waited another 15 minutes. They were to busy talking to friends and catching up to help other customers. It really left a bad taste in my mouth since I was ready to go home. 
It is a cool little spot. I would recommend going before 10pm because the crowd gets a little rowdy.

This place was fantastic. I had the falafel pita sandwich. The pita was very soft and fresh and there was a lot of falafel balls in it. Great prices. Next time, I'll eat in as they have couches to enjoy your food on.

The pita bread comes with a sauce that although spicy is delicious.  First time here but will definately come back and would recommend to other yelpers, cool spot with (so far) great food.

This place is amazing! Hookah is great! Food is amazing! Customer service is the best!  I love this place! Highly suggest it! Atmosphere is great! Huge TVs for sports and good music!

I live believing on the premise of "first impressions" having a lasting effect, and this one did not go particularly well in their favor.  Here's a breakdown of our first visit:

1. My girl and I waited about 20 minutes before being acknowledged by any staff and we actually had to ask, "Hey do you work here?" That should have been our first hint to leave but they seemed to be not too busy (all empty tables on our side of the room) and we didn't feel like traveling any further.

2. That person we asked "if he worked here" had to tell someone at the bar that we've been waiting and haven't been served, and 10 minutes later our server sits at our table and asks how long we've been waiting and we say "about 30 minutes." No consolation or apology - just took our hookah order and left.

3. Hookah experience was mediocre and hitting smoothly enough but no one came to check how we were doing or any coal check or blowouts for harshness.  The coal died out. I had to go up to the bar and request for more coal. It took 15-20 minutes for it to appear.

4.  Luckily the hookah itself required minimal maintenance because if it needed any actual attention we would have been screwed. Might as well stayed at home if I had to work for my own hookah setup. Stood up and flagged our server to order a refill for Blue Mist (figured if the setup was holding up we could chill for a bit without having to bother staff).

5. 20 minutes later the first guy we asked if he worked here apologized for the bad service (no consolation offered) and basically said "We're too busy taking care of other people." 5 minutes later I went up to the bar to request the check since he FORGOT that we ordered a refill for Blue Mist. Fastest part of all the service was him bringing us the check but made us wait to collect it, and so I walked it up to the bar once again.

6. He had trouble physically swiping my card and came back to our table asking if we had another method of payment and I said no. At this point my girl told him "To be honest the service hear sucked."  His reply: "Thank you for the feedback, that's out service. Let me try to swipe your card again." No apology or consolation offered.  Of course this time he was able to get my card to go through and I wrote on the signature slip: "Forgot about our Blue Mist."

Luckily there are a lot other choices on the southwest side like Paymon's or even all you can smoke at Karma in North Las Vegas. Yeah, we'd actually drive that far so we wouldn't have to experience "do it yourself hookah" again and the immaculate service at each place respectively is a huge bonus.

Comfortable place, clean, great location. Wifi. Great music, not too loud, not tol quiet. I don't what else you want.
